title: - Review of Fraser Suites Harmonie Paris La Defense, Courbevoie, France - TripAdvisor
text:
Very nice hotel and stuff, and services,hospitality is the service title.
I would recommend it to stay in this hotel, especially for families, as the security level is too high.
Can go to tourist sites by subway a few minutes at the bottom of the hotel
